name: Draw a Bead
description: Innate: The  range of Tristana's basic attacks,  Explosive Charge and  Buster Shot are increased by 0 − 136 (based on level) for a total of 525 − 661 (based on level) range.
descriptions: Innate: The  range of Tristana's basic attacks,  Explosive Charge and  Buster Shot are increased by 0 − 136 (based on level) for a total of 525 − 661 (based on level) range.

name: Rapid Fire
description: Active: Tristana empowers her cannon, gaining  bonus attack speed for 7 seconds.
descriptions: Active: Tristana empowers her cannon, gaining  bonus attack speed for 7 seconds.

name: Rocket Jump
description: Active: Tristana  jumps to the target location, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies on impact and  slowing them by 60%.
descriptions: Active: Tristana  jumps to the target location, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies on impact and  slowing them by 60%.
On enemy champion  takedowns or upon detonating  Explosive Charge at maximum stacks on an enemy champion, Rocket Jump's  cooldown is reset.

name: Explosive Charge
description: Passive: Enemies explode when killed by Tristana's basic attacks, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies.
levelings: Minimum Physical Damage:70 / 80 / 90 / 100 / 110 (+ 50 / 75 / 100 / 125 / 150% bonus AD) (+ 50% AP)
descriptions: Passive: Enemies explode when killed by Tristana's basic attacks, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies.

Active: Tristana places an explosive charge on the target enemy or enemy  turret. After 4 seconds, the charge detonates, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies and turrets. The explosion radius is doubled when used on a turret.

Tristana's basic attacks and abilities against the target increase Explosive Charge's damage by 30%, stacking up to 4 times for a maximum 120% increase, upon which the charge also detonates instantly.
Explosive Charge's total damage is increased by 0% − 33.3% (based on critical strike chance).
If  Buster Shot is used to apply the last stack, the detonation will instead be delayed until the end of the  knock back or the 4 seconds expire.

name: Buster Shot
description: Active: Tristana fires a massive cannonball at the target enemy, dealing magic damage to them and  knocking back and  stunning all enemies in a radius around them, including the target, for up-to 0.75 seconds.
descriptions: Active: Tristana fires a massive cannonball at the target enemy, dealing magic damage to them and  knocking back and  stunning all enemies in a radius around them, including the target, for up-to 0.75 seconds.
